long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HTML to JSX Converter

Description

Easily convert HTML to JSX(ReactJS) with our powerful and intuitive Chrome extension! Whether you’re a seasoned developer or just getting started with React, this tool will simplify your workflow by transforming your HTML snippets into JSX code in a matter of seconds.

Features

	•	Instant Conversion: Quickly convert HTML code to JSX with a single click.
	•	React Component Generation: Option to create functional React components from the converted JSX.
	•	Memoization: Easily wrap your components with React.memo for optimized performance.
	•	Custom Export Options: Choose between default and named exports for your components.
	•	User-Friendly Interface: Clean and responsive design with light and dark modes.
	•	Clipboard Integration: Copy the converted JSX code directly to your clipboard.
	•	Clear Input: One-click input clearing for rapid successive conversions.

How to Use

	1.	Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
	2.	Click on the extension icon in the Chrome toolbar.
	3.	Paste your HTML code into the provided textarea.
	4.	Select your desired options for React component generation, memoization, and export type.
	5.	Click “Convert to JSX” to see your converted code.
	6.	Copy the JSX (ReactJS) code to your clipboard and use it in your React projects!

Why Choose HTML to JSX Converter?

Our extension is designed to streamline your development process, making it easier to integrate HTML snippets into your React projects. Whether you’re refactoring an existing project or starting from scratch, our tool will save you time and effort.

Support

If you enjoy using HTML to JSX Converter, please consider leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow developers. Your feedback and support are greatly appreciated!
